context: Manhattan Associates, Inc. is a supply chain and omnichannel software company focused on warehouse management, transportation, and retail solutions. Supply chain platform leader. Competing with Blue Yonder, SAP.

competitors.name: Blue Yonder
competitors.notes: End-to-end supply chain solutions including WMS and TMS

competitors.name: SAP Supply Chain
competitors.notes: Integrated supply chain management within SAP ecosystem

competitors.name: Oracle Supply Chain Cloud
competitors.notes: Cloud-based SCM including warehouse and transportation management

competitors.name: Körber
competitors.notes: Supply chain software including warehouse management systems

competitors.name: Infor WMS
competitors.notes: Warehouse management solutions for various industries

competitors.name: Softeon
competitors.notes: WMS and fulfillment solutions for complex operations
